channel.title: Vegan Recipe Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Vegan Recipe Blog

item.title: About this blog
item.description: This is a vegan recipe blog, featuring recipes that I have created, learned from friends, or modified from the Internet. And no long blog intros! I have another website that contains some of my math/software projects. It is completely different from vegan recipes.

item.title: Tofu Scramble
item.description: Eventually a photo will go here. Ingredients 1 block firm tofu 1⁄2 cup nutritional yeast 1⁄3 cup soy sauce 4 tbsp maple syrup 2 tbsp cane vinegar (or lime juice) Directions
